CustomField.description: Total time duration of the job. Use this value to track job performance.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Start_Time__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(End_Time__c)) ), (End_Time__c - Start_Time__c)*24*60*60, NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total time duration of the job. Use this value to track job performance.
CustomField.label: Duration (in seconds)
